mapper.insert: insert into sjb_member(memberId, memberPs, memberName, memberGender, memberPhon, birthY, birthM, birthD, memberEmail, memberAdmin, memberAddr1, memberAddr2, memberAddr3, point, money) values(#{memberId}, #{memberPs},#{memberName},#{memberGender}, #{memberPhone}, #{birthY},#{birthM},#{birthD}, #{memberEmail}, 0, #{memberAddr1}, #{memberAddr2}, #{memberAddr3}, #{point}, #{money});
mapper.select: select memberId, memberName, memberAdmin, point, money from sjb_member where memberId = #{memberId} and memberPs = #{memberPs};
